narrative:
This focused inspection and exit interview was conducted with the owner by Curt McGruder-ACI.  This was a
reinspection of the noncompliant items identified on the inspection dated 07/29/15.
No noncompliant items identified this inspection.
Note:  Both dogs identified on the previous inspection have been evaluated by a licensed veterinarian.  Treatment
plans and medications have been provided for both dogs and are being followed as per veterinarian(cid:25)s
recommendations.
Note: This is a transcribed copy of the original report.
